Package app

Class Question

java.lang.Object
app.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageQuestion, MAQuestion, SAQuestion
public abstract class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Parent class of all Question classes. Handles all information and interaction associated with a single trivia question.
Author:
obergman, klastine, gscott4
See Also:
Single-answer question, Multi-answer question, Image question, Serialized Form
